Texts.Chs: ^orange;筛粉机^reset;需要电力才能运作，它作用于沙、砾石等松散材料，从其中筛选出有用材料。快去制作一个^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;吧，虽说它效率有些慢。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Sifter^reset; requires power, but allows you to toss in sand, gravel and other loose materials and sift for hidden goodies. Very useful. The wood sifter is quite slow. But one cannot complain about free resources. Try building a ^orange;Sifter^reset; now.

Texts.Chs: 如果你想让它更自动化，请尝试制作以下两个设备：物品传输装置、储存桥接器，然后把它们连接到筛粉机上！这样一来的话，产出的材料就会自动转移到你的储存容器里了！
Texts.Eng: If you want to step up your game, try creating a few items next: ^orange;Router^reset; a ^orange;Storage Bridge^reset; linking them to the Sifter! You'll be able to automatically transfer from a crafting station to a storage container!
